articles.author: Tamara Hardingham-Gill
articles.title: The world’s most liveable cities for 2024 - CNN
articles.description: The ranking of the world’s most liveable cities for 2024 has just been released by the Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU), and a European city has come out on top.
articles.content:
Its considered among the most beautiful cities in the world to visit, and it seems that Vienna may also be an unbeatable place to live.
The Austrian city has been crowned the most liveable city in t… [+3684 chars]
